data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Zb6Jz1g5XggQ7kNvgGhysMu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_RMCvInZA1FC1-stiPwNsskBU1WIkv2rl9So3PMTVgg&oe=66449D1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=9oOXB913nTAQ7kNvgEjhMyN&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAiPI_5F0GKJjOnVhF0Vx1N8wnuOy6EfsDg-oV8opslrQ&oe=6644A6A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aX0vzNZwJj8Q7kNvgGFGYNO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAWT22aHeSFU-jOatcK5_xhiSoQ1gNauXZtWTbzB8ZsLw&oe=66448E07)

Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.
![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XxBRbTt9i50Q7kNvgEknsy6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDi2vlJ6O3y5Xf2mH-09ftipjSWlXdgd67djarzgLQHkA&oe=664480E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tBMCRAlIJRYQ7kNvgEiqT0F&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA2r2gtrBz2tRWBoZpYcfVbDlDbQGXGxnoKIAkod74Fow&oe=6644AD58)

Celebrated for its cinematic narrative and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ar87qMvq764Q7kNvgHtsdFF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDYBiHqeVCs03X9wEvaZLBATlgvposUouv8ZRBc8nci9Q&oe=6644A9D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DrFkjQFbVEcQ7kNvgHoZ0lP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYADbmz-PnUgphsXDBXR5jq6RGkKSSquOc48pKGvB0h0lg&oe=66448FF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s35cVZF04egQ7kNvgGlXEe9&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBzXin2KnDQ3yRK0OLFWdukej_hF0uM1t6kXSpVnpJXLw&oe=66447A6A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WcuBO1FYt18Q7kNvgG35-0k&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDJed9df0hjmLNygZD0SVlftRHfrIqcwEMrPDCMK1iS9Q&oe=66448E17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7E8C09n9z9sQ7kNvgFBOFRW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBMhFDG7vmCgT6ZfqHYCqjYJC4bPw3NjUH8TZOAB4msVw&oe=6644A98C)
